articles.title: Weeping US Marine describes Afghan 'catastrophe' before Congress - BBC
articles.description: A congressional inquiry into the 2021 withdrawal hears emotional testimony from a bomb victim.
articles.content:
A former US Marine badly injured in Afghanistan has described the withdrawal in 2021 as a "catastrophe" in testimony before Congress. 
Tyler Vargas-Andrews spoke in the first of a series of Republic… [+3516 chars]

articles.title: Google Pixel Fold allegedly spotted in the wild for the first time - Android Authority
articles.description: The highly anticipated Google Pixel Fold might have just been seen in the wild for the very first time thanks to a Reddit user.
articles.content:
• A Reddit user claims they saw a Google employee with a Pixel Fold while on a train.
  • The user described the device as dark blue or black, thin bezels on the outside, and thin.

articles.title: Early childhood lower respiratory tract infection and premature adult death from respiratory disease in Great Britain: a national birth cohort study - The Lancet
articles.description:
In this prospective, life-spanning, nationally representative cohort study, LRTI during
early childhood was associated with almost a two times increased risk of premature
adult death from respiratory disease, and accounted for one-fifth of these deaths.
